## Installation

You can install the released version of ProgressDataDirectConnect4R from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("ProgressDataDirectConnect4R")
```

## Downloads

Downloads the evaluation [Jar](https://media.datadirect.com/download/files/evals/JDBC/PROGRESS_DATADIRECT_JDBC_OE_ALL.jar) from Progress. Temporarily unpacks the resources.

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(ProgressDataDirectConnect4R)
## basic example code
```
